mapper.select: select distinct u.id, username, real_name, email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, status, del_flag, depart_ids, user_identity, u.remark from sys_admin u join sys_user_role uur on u.id = uur.user_id left join sys_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id where uur.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT distinct u.id, username, real_name, u.email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, status, del_flag, depart_ids, user_identity, u.remark FROM sys_admin u left join sys_user_dept uud on u.id = uud.user_id
left join sys_dept ud on uud.dept_id = ud.id
left join sys_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id
u.del_flag = 0
and ud.parent_list like CONCAT((select parent_list from sys_dept where id = #{deptId}),'%')
and
ud.parent_list like CONCAT((select parent_list from sys_dept where id = #{id}),'%')
and username like CONCAT(#{username},'%')
and real_name like CONCAT(#{realName},'%')
order by u.id

select u.id, username, real_name, email, tel, sex, concat(uf.path, '/', uf.name, uf.postfix) as avatar, avatar_file_id, password, status, del_flag, depart_ids, user_identity, u.remark from sys_admin u left join sys_file uf on u.avatar_file_id = uf.id where u.username = #{username};
